Articles.Content:
Looks great. But don\'t you think that\'s a little too much ice? I mean, compare it to Mars. Regardless, can\'t wait to orbit it and landing should be kind of cool, too/

I don\'t want to make things just like 'Hey look at this, it\'s like mars with a different name', I\'m trying to add unique elements to the planets.

I don\'t want to make things just like 'Hey look at this, it\'s like mars with a different name', I\'m trying to add unique elements to the planets.

I know what you mean, but I don\'t want to feel like I\'m orbiting Hoth. (not insulting you, just saw the opportunity to crack a really shitty joke and went for it.) Anyway, it\'s your planet. I was just suggesting you take the ice caps down a little. But, honestly, do it how you would like to do it. Only when the rest of the people agree with me should you even care.

Okay, I\'m willing to call this one done.

How do you make these?
How about some fjords?
Did you ever have any luck getting that camera plugin working?

How about some fjords?

PINING for something?

How about some fjords?

+1

He might actually win an award with fjords!
And one day, when wandering through them, we\'ll see, carved in the ice, NovaSilisko

And one day, when wandering through them, we\'ll see, carved in the ice, NovaSilisko

not that, we\'ll see NOVA WUZ HEER

How do you make these?

Libnoise and Photoshop.
Dat crater.

That\'s no planet... that\'s a space station...

or 42

Reminds me the ond game Lego CrystAlien Conflict (pretty cool, google it). There was 42s all around the Mars surface, and i didn\'t understood why... then i saw the movie
Do you have a name for that masterpiece?

Do you have a name for that masterpiece?

Lumoso is the best I could come up with.

Lumoso is the best I could come up with.

Reminds me of an old bad guy KAOS assassin from the show 'Get Smart'. Lumocco. (May or may not be correct spelling).

That\'s a good name. Hopefully we\'ll see that as a KSP planet some day.

Giant crater = Nova Crater?

I don\'t get it Nova. Why are you working on planets? They look nice, but are you planning to add extra planets with a plugin? I thought that planets could only reasonable be added by the developers...

What about all those awesome parts that you were working on? the hinges, the cameras, and the rest? did you just lose interest or do you want to release them later?
He took a break from making the parts to make planets, among doing other things. Read the thread.

I don\'t get it Nova. Why are you working on planets? They look nice, but are you planning to add extra planets with a plugin? I thought that planets could only reasonable be added by the developers...

What about all those awesome parts that you were working on? the hinges, the cameras, and the rest? did you just lose interest or do you want to release them later?

The hinges and cameras are still only half-working. Hinges don\'t resume from the SFS properly and cameras don\'t render distant objects. There\'s still lots of work to do...

Well what about all the other awesome parts you were working on? Surely you have something done by now.

C\'mon, man. We need our fix.

I don\'t get it Nova. Why are you working on planets? They look nice, but are you planning to add extra planets with a plugin? I thought that planets could only reasonable be added by the developers...

What about all those awesome parts that you were working on? the hinges, the cameras, and the rest? did you just lose interest or do you want to release them later?

Amagine working on these mods for a while. He needed a change in scenery (or what he was doing). He will be back doing the mods later (happened with the Skyrim Mod and ksp mods).

Well what about all the other awesome parts you were working on? Surely you have something done by now.

C\'mon, man. We need our fix.

Well, SE2 Alpha 2 is the closest one to being done... I could release BACE early but it has very few parts right now.

Well, SE2 Alpha 2 is the closest one to being done... I could release BACE early but it has very few parts right now.

Frankly I\'d be happy if all you released were the BASE cargo craft, docking port and the inflatable space station part.

Frankly I\'d be happy if all you released were the BASE cargo craft, docking port and the inflatable space station part.

and hinges!
